titleStmt.title: SII 5.431: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 431. (A.R. No. 140 of 1894) IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
sasi śrī . pūmaruviya tirumaṭantaiyum puvimaṭantaiyum puyattiruppa nāmaruviya kalaimaṭantaiyum jayamaṭantaiyum nalañciṟappa koḷārnta ciṉappuliyuṅ koṭuñcilaiyuṅ kulaintoḷippa vāḷārnta poṟkirimel varikkayalkaḷ viḷaiyāṭa Iruṅkaṭalva
laiyat tiṉitaṟam perukak karuṅkali kaṭintu ceṅkol naṭappa Orukuṭainiḻal lirunilaṅ kuḷira muvakaittamiḻu muṟaimaiyil viḷaṅka nālvakai vetamu naviṉṟuṭaṉ vaḷara Aiyvakaiveḻviyuñ ceyviṉai yiyaṟṟa Aṟuvakaic camaiyamum Aḻakuṭan tikaḻa Eḻu
vakaippāṭalu miyaluṭaṉ parava Eṇṭicaiyaḷavuñ cakkarañ cellak koṅkaṇar kaliṅkar kocalar māḷuvar ciṅkaḷar teliṅkar kiṉṉarar kuccarar villavar makatar vikkalar cempiyar pallavar mutaliyar pāttivar Ellā muṟaiviṭa maruḷeṉa Oruvarmuṉ ṉoruvar muṟaimuṟai kaṭava tanti
ṟai kuṇantiṟaiñca Ilaṅkoḷi maṇimuṭi yintiraṉ pūṭṭiya polaṉkati rārama mārviṉiṟ poliya paṉimalarṟ tāmarait ticaimukaṉ paṭaitta maṉuneṟi taḻaippa maṇimuṭi cūṭip poṉṉicūḻnāṭṭup puliyāṇai poyakal kaṉṉicūḻnāṭṭiṟ kayalāṇai kaiyvaḷara veñciṉa vivuḷiyum ⌈
veḻamum pararaparappit tañcaiyu muṟantaiyuñ centaḻal koḷutti kāvinilamum niṉṟu kaviniḻaṟṟa Āviyu māṟu maṇinirnala ṉaḻittu kūṭamu māmatiḷuṅ kopuramum māṭaraṅkum māḷikaiyum maṇṭapamum pala Iṭittu toḻutuvantaṭaiyār nirupartan tokaiya raḻuta kaṇṇī rāṟu parappik kaḻu
taikoṇ ṭuḻutu kavaṭi viccic cempiyaṉaicciṉam viriyap porutu cūurampuka voṭṭi paimpoṉmaṇimuṭi paṟittup pāṇaṉukkuk kuṭuttaruḷi pāṭaruñ ciṟappiṟ parutivāṉṟoyu māṭakap puruicai yāyirattaḷiyil coravaḷavaṉ Abhiṣekamaṇṭapattu virar Abhiṣekam paṇṇī pukaḻ virittu nāḷum
pararācar nāmattalai piṭuṅki miḷuntaṟukaṇ matacyāṉai melkoṇṭu nirāḻivaiyya muḻutum potu viḻitta kūrāḻiyuñ ceyyatoḷumey koṇṭu poy Ayyappaṭāta Arumaṟaite rantaṇar vāḻ teyvappuliyūṟ tiruvellaiyuṭ pukkup poṉṉampalam poliya Āṭuvār pūvaiyuṭaṉ ma
ṉṉun tirumeṉi kaṇṭu maṉaṅkaḷippak kolamalarme layaṉuṅ kuḷirtuḻāy mālum Aṟiyā malaṟccevaṭi vaṇaṅka vāṅkuciṟai yaṉṉan tuyiloḻiya vaṇṭeḻuppum pūṅkamalavāvi cūḻ poṉṉamarāpatiyil Ottulakan tāṅku muyar meruvaik kuṇantuvaittaṉaiya cotimaṇimaṇṭapat tirutti
colaimali paḻaṉaṟ coṇāṭun tāṉiḻanta mālaimuṭiyun tara varukaveṉ ṟaḻaippa vāṉ nilaikulaiya vāḷakirik kappuṟattup poṉa vaḷava ṉurimaiyuṭaṉ pukuntu peṟṟa putalvaṉai niṉpereṉṟu muṉkāṭṭi veṟṟi yariyaṇaikkiḻ viḻuntu toḻu tirappat tāṉoṭi muṉṉiḻanta vemmai
yelāṅ kaiyyakala tāṉoUtakam paṇṇi taṇṭār muṭiyuṭaṉe viṭṭa Akaliṭantaṉ mārveḷaikkuttiliya Iṭṭapaṭik keṉṟum Itu piṭipāṭāka veṉap poṅkutirirai ñālattup pūpālar toḻa viḷaṅkuñ ceṅkayal koṇṭu Eṟun tirumukamum paṇṭiḻanta coḷapatiyeṉṉu nāmamun toṉṉakaru miḷa
vaḻaṅki viṭai kuṭuttu viṭṭaruḷi Onakkaṭaṟ pāril ventarkaḷaik kuṟṟateṅkaḷ tiṟkuṅ kaṭavu ḷivaṉeṉ ṟeṇṇit taṉaiyuṟ ṟaṭaiyātār taṇṭaliṭaiyiṟ kiḷaiyuṟṟeṉa muḻutuṅ keṭṭaruḷa Eṉṟetti vaṇaṅkum vaṭakoṅkaṉṉai ciṟaiyum miṭṭu kaḷaṅkoḷaru niruttoṉmālai kaḻittel vaḻaṅki
yaruḷiyapi ṉorunāḷ maṟṟāra muḻaṅku muracak kaṭaṟṟāṉaimuṉ pukuntu teṉkoṅkar vantiṭṭa teṇṭaṉukku miṉ poṅkac cānttiya Āparaṇan takkateṉa vaḻaṅki Āṟāta perunaṇpi ṉavaṉ ciṟaiyu miṭṭu tirumāl yirumaruṅku cantira cūriyar cevikka ceṅkaṭ karumāl kaḷikkiṟṟilvaru muṭkkaṭ kaṭavuḷeṉamāṭamaturaiyiṟ
tāṉ pontu puvaṉiyile kūṭṭuk koṅkaraiyuṅ kumpiṭukoṇṭavarkku tollaip puvikku miṇaṅkāmaṟ tāñcoṉṉa Ellaikku ṇiṟpa Icaintiṭṭu peṟpak koṇṭivaṉṟu ceyyātoḻiyil Iyamakku veṟu vel viruntākkutu mumaiyeṉa viṭṭaruḷi muṉṉamnamakku muṭivaḻaṅku cevaṭikkiḻ Iṉṉa
m vaḻipaṭuvo meṉṉātupiṉṉorunāḷ kāvalaṉatu puṉanāṭeṉuṅ kaḷiyā leva letircellā tiṟaimaṟutta ceṉṉiviṭu tūciyum peraṇiyum Okkac curuṇṭotuṅki vāciyum vāraṇamum teru maṭaṟkaruvakkālāṉum veṭṭuṇṇak kaṇṇiraṇṭu mayaṅkak kaiykoṇṭu velāvalaiyattu viḻntavaṉ poy mey
naṭuṅka Amparuntu mārtta kaṭal maṇṭalikaruṭal vemparuntuṇṇa Akkaḷattil Āṉaiyiṉ veṇmaruppuṅkaiyyuṅ kuṉṟaitteṅkaḷ miṉavaṟku pālkuṭamāmeṉṟu tāṉ virar koṉ mākamukaṭu taṭavi maḻai maṭukkum kākaneṭumpantaṟ ke ta tāṭalum kūkaiyum pāṭaluṅ kaṇṭum keṭṭuṅ kaḷitta Oṭal karuṅkūn
tal veḷḷeyiṟil cevvāy periya cūlakkavalli palikoḷka Eṉa vāḻtti veṉṟu vakaiyil mikaiyoḻiya ventalaṟk koṉṟu ciṉan taṇiyāk koṟṟava neṭuvāḷ Uyaṟku ceṅkurutinirit toḷiceytu tekupulattu veṇkavaṭi vitta viramuḻuteṭuttu pāṭum paraṇi taṉ pārventar keṭpikka Āṭun tirumañ
caṇanirkaḷ maṇ kuḷira Āṅkavan tiṇaikkaṭṭaṇattu kaṟpu taṉakkāṉāy Oṅkurimaikkuḻām morukai ticaiykoṇṭu murimaṇip paṭṭaṅ kaṭṭi muṭicūṭṭi mārpil Aṇaittu vaḷavaṉvaṉmutalteviyeṉṟu pekar peṟṟa vañcimutalāy peyvaḷaiyār poṅku puṉaṟkum capamutalāka polavar pukaḻa
maṅkalaṅkaḷ Eṭṭum maṇikkatalat tenti koṭikoṇṭa neṟṟi niṟaintak kopuraṅ cūḻ muṭikoṇṭacoḷapura maṇṭapattu pukuta ticaitoṟum coemapoṟ ceyattampam nāṭṭi vākaik katirvel vaṭaventartam pātam mekattaḻai Aṇiya virakkaḻa laṇintu viḷaṅkiya maṇiyaṇi virasiṁhāsaṉattu
vaḻaṅkeḻu kavari yirumaruṅ kacaippa kaṭaleṉṉa muḻaṅkuṅ kaḻinalliyāṉai vaṭapulaventar maṇippuyam piriyā Ilaṅku kuḻaiyaruivuvaiyar toḻutuniṉṟettum Ulakumuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya śrīkomāṟapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravat=tikaḷ śrīcoṇāṭu koṇṭu muṭikoṇ
ṭacoḻapurattu virarabhiṣekam paṇṇiAruḷiya śrīsundarapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10vatu nāḷ 3 100 7 10 4 ṉāl kiḻvempanāṭṭut tirunelvelik koyiṟ paḷḷiyaṟaikūṭattup paḷḷippiṭam maḻavarāyaṉil Eḻuntaruḷiyiruntu Uṭaiyār tirunelveliUṭaiyar koyiṟ patipātamulap
paṭṭuṭaip pañcācāriya tevarkaṉmikaḷ ceyyattiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉapaṭi kālaṭiccaṅkaraṉ Aḻakiyaperumāṉāṉa maḻavarāyar pū[ji]ttu Ikkoyilil Āśrayaliṃgamāka Eḻuntaruḷivitta cokkaṉārrkku tiruppaṭimāṟ ṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukkum I
var piṟanta cataiyattu nāḷ viśeṣapūjai ceyya Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi yuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉavukkum muḷḷināṭṭu Irājarājaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu piṭākai kayattāṉkuṟucciyil kaārpacāṉam viḷaiyunilattu maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku Ivar pitākkaḷ Appāṭṭar maḻavar
āyaṟku jivitamāy piṉpu Ivaṟku maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku jivitamāy varukiṟa nilattu talaivarucai nilattile Ivvūr kaṭamaiyiṟukkuṅ kolāla Oṉṟaṟaiveli nilam Irupatāvatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu mutal Antaraāyamum Uḻutāṉkuṭiyum Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāy Iṟuppatāka I
ṭappeṟaveṇumeṉṟu Ivar namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ittevaṟkut tiruppaṭimāṟaṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭun nivantaṅkaḷukkum Ivar piṟanta catayattu nāḷ viśeṣapūjai ceyya Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉavukkum muḷḷināṭṭu Irājarājaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu piṭā
kai kayattāṉkuṟucciyil kārpacāṉam viḷaiyum nilattu maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku Ivar pitākkaḷ Appāṭṭar maḻavarāyaṟku jīvitamāy piṉpu Ivaṟku maṇṭala mutaṉmaikku jivitamāy varukiṟa nilattu talaivarucai nilattile Ivvūr kaṭamaiyiṟukkuṅ colāl Oṉṟaraiveli nilam Iv
vāṇṭu mutal Antarāyamum Uḻutāṉkuṭiyum Uṭpaṭa tevatāṉayiṟailiyā yiyiṟuppatāka Iṭṭu variyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum nam Ōlaiyum taraccoṉṉom . kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭa nivantaṅkaḷ cellappaṇṇukaveṉṟum Ippaṭi cantirātittavaṟ celvatā
ka kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭivittukkoḷka veṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉapaṭikku Ivai tirumallināṭṭut taṭaṅkaṇṇic ciṟṟūruṭaiyāṉ coṟaṉ Uyyaniṉṟāṭuvāṉāṉa kurukulattaracaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟatu kīḻkūṟṟu veṭciyūrāṉa mummuṭico
ḻanallūr veṭaṉūruṭaiyān Araiyaṉ civallavaṉāṉa mātavarācaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai cevvirukkaināṭṭuc cakkarapāṇinallūr Araiyaṉ viratamuṭiccāṉāṉa pallavarācaṉ Eḻuttu .... triguvaṉaccakkaravartti koneriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ Uṭaiyār tirunelveliUṭaiyār
koyil patipātamulap pa[ṭṭuṭaip pañcācāriya tevakaṉmikaḷukku kālaṭic caṅkara ṉaḻakapperumāḷāṉa maḻavarāyar pūcittu Ikkoyilil Āśrayaliṃgamāka Eḻuntaruḷuvitta cokkaṉārrkku tiruppaṭimāṟṟu Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukkum Ivar piṟanta cataiyattu nāḷ viśeṣapūjai ceyya Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi
Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉavukkum muḷḷināṭṭu Irājarājaccaturvvedimaṅkalattup piṭākai kayattāṉkuṟucci kārpacāṉam viḷaiyum nilattu maṇṭalamutalmaikku Ivar pitākkaḷ Appāṭṭaṉ maḻavarāyararkku jivitamāyp piṉpu Ivarkku maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku jivitamāy varukiṟa nilattu talaivaricai nilattile Ivvūrk kaṭamai
yiṟukkuṅ kolāl Oṉṟaraiveli nilam Irupatāvati ṉetirāmāṇṭu mutal Antarāyamum Uḻutāṉkuṭiyu muṭpaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyā yiṟuppatāka Iṭappeṟaveṇu meṉṟu Ivar namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ittevarkku tiruppaṭimāṟṟu Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukkum Ivar piṟanta cataiyattu nā
ḷ viśeṣapūjai ceyya Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉavukkum muḷḷināṭṭu Irājarājaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu piṭākai kayattāṉkuṟucciyil kār pacāṉam viḷaiyu nilattu maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku pitākkaḷ Appāṭṭar maḻavarāyarkku jivitamāyp piṉpu Ivākku maṇṭalamutaṉmaikku jivitamā
y varukiṟa nilattu talaivaricai nilattile Ivvūrk kaṭamaiyiṟukkuṅ kolāl Oṉṟarai veli nilam Ivvāṇṭu mutal Antarāyamum Uḻutāṉkuṭiyum Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyā yiṟuppatāka Iṭṭu variyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum namkeḻviyum taraccoṉṉom . kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṭimāṟṟu Uḷ
ḷiṭṭum nivantaṅkaḷ cellappaṇṇi Ippaṭi cantirātittavaṟ celvatāka kallilum cempilum veṭṭuvittukoḷka . Ivai paṉappaṟaḷaināṭṭu nirmaṭaiyūr pukaḻaṉ periyāṉāṉa paḻantiparāyaṉ Eḻuttu .. Ivai peruṅkuṭināṭṭu kiḻneṭṭurāṉa kirttivicālayanallūr nakkaṉ Iraṭṭai
yāṉa toṇṭaimāṉ Eḻuttu .... yāṇṭu 2 10vatu nāḷ 4 100 3 10 Ivai neṟcuranāṭṭu pe vūccayāṉa taraṇiviccātiranallūr nampi kālakālaṉāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyak koṅkarājaṉ Eḻuttu ....
